DEMO_304_MSG_010:
̂This is the Virtual Colosseum. An institute created 
for the sole purpose of exclusively training Monster Masters.
DEMO_304_MSG_020: ̂Allow me one moment to confirm that you are an authorized user of this training facility.
DEMO_304_MSG_030:
̂My scan indicates that ȁ is indeed confirmed... Now registering this Master's information...
ā
DEMO_304_MSG_040:
̂You have been identified as Master #%ls...
Welcome to training, Master ȁ.
ā
DEMO_304_MSG_050:
̂This time, I will be walking Master ȁ through the B-Rank exam.
ā
DEMO_304_MSG_060: ̂If you complete the B-Rank exam successfully, you'll have earned the Underwater Ride ability.
DEMO_304_MSG_070:
̂This allows a Master to ride a monster and submerge themselves underwater.
ā
DEMO_304_MSG_080: ̂Expanding your horizons and taking advantage of this opportunity is a key step on your journey ahead.
DEMO_304_MSG_090: ̂Proceed to the gate ahead, where a combat test will be administered.
